au.com.team2moro.couchdbsyncer
Interface DownloadPolicy

public interface DownloadPolicy

Method Summary
 boolean getAttachmentDownload(Attachment attachment)
          Return the download policy for the given attachment.
 int getAttachmentPriority(Attachment attachment)
          Return the download thread priority for the given attachment
 boolean getDocumentDownload(Document document)
          Return the download policy for the given document.
 int getDocumentPriority(Document document)
          Return the download thread priority for the given document
 

Method Detail

getAttachmentDownload

boolean getAttachmentDownload(Attachment attachment)
Return the download policy for the given attachment. The default policy is to download all attachments.

Parameters:
attachment - the attachment to be downloaded
Returns:
true to download the attachment, false otherwise. If false, metadata for the attachment is still saved and available locally, but the content is not downloaded from the server.

getDocumentDownload

boolean getDocumentDownload(Document document)
Return the download policy for the given document. The default policy is to download all documents except design documents.

Parameters:
document - the document to be downloaded
Returns:
true to download the document, false otherwise. If false, no data is stored locally for this document.

getAttachmentPriority

int getAttachmentPriority(Attachment attachment)
Return the download thread priority for the given attachment

Parameters:
attachment - the attachment to be downloaded
Returns:
an integer between Thread.MIN_PRIORITY and Thread.MAX_PRIORITY

getDocumentPriority

int getDocumentPriority(Document document)
Return the download thread priority for the given document

Parameters:
document - the document to be downloaded
Returns:
an integer between Thread.MIN_PRIORITY and Thread.MAX_PRIORITY
